activity.title: coronasafe/care#664
activity.text:
@sainak 
I would like to contribute to this repo. But When I tried setting up the local development containers using docker (as per instructions [here](https://care-be-docs.coronasafe.network/local-setup/configuration.html#)) , 
When I ran `make up` I got the following error, 
`docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f 'docker-compose.local.yaml' up -d --wait
unknown shorthand flag: 'f' in -f
See 'docker --help'.
`
I had used docker-compose, django in my pet projects. 
**I am a complete begineer to open source. Could you please help me get the containers up and running..?**
